tool_description: The End-to-End KYC compliance solution An integrated platform to effortlessly meet all your Anti-Money Laundering and KYC requirements - on the back of a modern Web Portal and a developer-friendly API.

api_list.name: Fetchallverifications
GetAPIoauth2token
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cleardil1.p.rapidapi.com/oauth2/token"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cleardil1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
